pr_title: Fix bug in main screen tabs state management

timeline.author: Stypox
Stypox

replies.bodyText: I think the name was confusing at first and I decided to keep things clear, however, later on I renamed to something more readable and indeed, it would be better to do this.
replies.author: mauriciocolli

timeline.bodyText: Couldn't this be put inside the if (!wasAdapterNull), too?
timeline.author: Stypox

timeline.message:
Fix bug in main screen tabs state management

Tabs were not being destroyed/restored correctly due to a call to a
method that populated the view pager before it even had a chance of
restoring itself.

The solution was to null out the adapter before calling that method so
the view pager will postpone the populating process.
